de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.distance

Interface DistanceQuery<O>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DatabaseQuery
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DistanceSimilarityQuery<O>, IndexBasedDistanceFunction.Instance<T,I>, SpatialDistanceQuery<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatabaseDistanceFunction.Instance, AbstractDatabaseDistanceQuery, AbstractDistanceQuery, AbstractIndexBasedDistanceFunction.Instance, AbstractSimilarityAdapter.Instance, ArccosSimilarityAdapter.Instance, DBIDDistanceQuery, DBIDRangeDistanceQuery, LinearAdapterLinear.Instance, LnSimilarityAdapter.Instance, PrecomputedDistanceMatrix.PrecomputedDistanceQuery, PrimitiveDistanceQuery, PrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery, SharedNearestNeighborJaccardDistanceFunction.Instance, SpatialPrimitiveDistanceQuery

    public interface DistanceQuery<O>
extends DatabaseQuery
    A distance query serves as adapter layer for database and primitive distances.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.DatabaseQuery

        HINT_BULK, HINT_EXACT, HINT_HEAVY_USE, HINT_NO_CACHE, HINT_OPTIMIZED_ONLY, HINT_SINGLE
